descriptions.title: Ritual Text Related to the Vase
descriptions.content:
Description:

Bod rgya tshig mdzod chen mo: dbang gi sta gon gyi cho ga'i nang gses shig ste/ bum pa'i rgyu dang mtshan nyid dang grangs dang nang gi bcud dang mgul chings dang kha rgyan la sogs pa tshul bzhin du byas la/ der dam tshig gi lha bskyed nas ye shes pa gzhug cing dbang bskur la mchod cing bstod de bzlas).

Example Texts

  • Bum pa sta gon la nye bar mkho ba'i yig chung 
  • Bcom ldan 'das dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'i yan lag slob ma rjes 'dzin dang sa chog gi skor sta gon gyi skor dkyil 'khor bri thig tshon bkye ba sgrub cing mchod pa'i skor bcas
